posts.message: Good Evening Geeks, i have an idea and i want to analysis it the best way from the tiny details to object oriented classes and modules and connect all together, i want also allow the system to be able to update from the server, to be clear i want some suggestions about analysis and design methodologies that help me to analysis my system from the idea to the implementation and release :)

So Mean.io
now are 2 projects one dumb which is the original project
and the other is smart from the creator of meanjs.

Mean.io has plugins
Meanjs has plugins

They're not compatible.
Anyone figured out how to use mean.io plugins to meanjs ?

posts.message:
The Problem: 
A huge SQL Server database for government sector get grows by huge amount of data every 2 months.
So they move the completed transactions to backups every 2 months to make the business solution working fine and faster.
But when they try to search or making some business upon old transactions they enforced to extract the old transactions from old backups and move it to production DB.
The Question: what is the best solution or way to automatically extend the current SQl Server database to multiple database automatically every period time and the custom business solution can deal with them all.
10 Knockout Binding Handlers I Don't Want To Live Without
